items.summary: Create a minimal root-level package.json that is sufficient to install and build the existing React+TypeScript frontend without regenerating or rewriting any existing application source files.
Create a minimal root-level dfx.json defining canisters for the existing backend and frontend assets, without changing any backend code and without attempting deployment.
Ensure the frontend entry files exist and are valid: frontend/index.html and frontend/src/main.tsx. If they already exist, do not modify them; only create them if missing.

After creating only the minimal structure files (package.json, dfx.json, and ensuring the frontend entry files exist), STOP and provide an explicit confirmation that these files physically exist in the workspace before any build attempt or further changes.
